DOC.criteria: History consistent Type 1 diabetes least 2 year prior enrollment ; For least 6 month prior enrollment , insulin pump user multiple daily insulin injection ; At least 18 year age ; Available capable follow protocol instruction provide healthcare professional ; Signed date Informed Consent form . Pregnancy ; Type 2 , gestational , secondary diabetes ; Known allergy medical grade adhesive skin disinfectant ; Skin abnormalities insertion site would confound assessment effect device skin ; Blood donation within 6 week prior begin study activity ; Within past 6 month , severe hypoglycemic episode ( ) result hospitalization loss consciousness ; Active myocardial ischemia ; Previous history stroke ; Any concomitant medical condition opinion principal investigator would likely affect evaluation device performance and/or safety ; Current participation another clinical trial .
